Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

	Execute technical work for FEED and Detailed Designs (designs, specifications, drawings, etc.) within designated scopes.
	Carry out Electrical design, and generate all electrical design deliverables including but not limited to:
	
		Load schedule.
		Electro Magnetic Compatibility studies.
		Electrical Key and Single Line Diagrams.
		Substation/Switch room Layout Drawings.
		Power Generation and Distribution Philosophy.
		Systems Operations Philosophy.
		MTO
		Connection Diagrams.
		Cable Sizing Calculation and Selection Report.
		Cable Tray and Cable Routing Layout Drawings.
		Lighting and Small Power Layout Drawings.
		Earthing Layout Drawings.
		Electrical Heat Tracing Drawings.
		Electrical Specifications and Data Sheets.
		Building Layout Drawings.
		Bid Packages for Competitive Bidding.
		Purchase Orders for all Materials.
		Equipment Specifications.
		Equipment Data Sheets and Drawings.
	
	
	Perform Power System Studies (Including but not limited to Short circuit/load flow, Fault level, Motor Starting etc).
	Carry out appropriate discipline and inter discipline checks and reviews of engineering and design work
	Follow-on engineering: Remain engaged in design issues and decisions throughout construction, commissioning and start-up
	Ensure Integration of Electrical Engineering design from all other vendor packages
	Review of construction drawings for Installation and Construction activities
	Supervision of construction activities
	Update of As-Built documentation as required
	Create demonstrable value for customers by understanding their drivers and critical success factors.
	Deliver continuously improving performance, benchmarked as top tier in the industry.
	Ensure own discipline engineering and design work are successfully delivered and appropriate reviews conducted.
	Ensure quality of technical work and the technical integrity, functionality, constructability, safe operation and of reliability of designs.
	Contribute to excellent HSE performance throughout the engineering phase of the project life cycle.
	Contribute to Safety and Operability review (SAFOP) study.
	Maintain effective interfaces and relationships within/between disciplines within the design office and members of Projects/Customer teams.
	Keep track on the execution schedule and report any issues to stakeholders.
	Support the construction team in the development of work pack for field execution.
	Support the CSU team in the handover of equipment and documentation to the operation team.
	Carry out verification and follow-up on the update to as-built documents.


Qualifications, Experience and Competence Requirements


	COREN Registered Professional Engineer.
	15 years of experience in design of offshore oil and gas production facilities including 12 years of experience in engineering design of oil facilities, petrochemical or oil and gas handling projects and training/competence development for junior engineers.
	B.Eng./B.Sc. in Electrical/Electronics Engineering from an accredited institution.
	Master&rsquo;s degree in Engineering (added advantage).
	Thorough knowledge of oil field engineering construction methods including its practice and procedures.
	Demonstrated experience working on engineering teams on at least 3 projects of total value US$15 MM each construction contract value.
	Familiar with codes standards regulations and practices applicable to the design and construction of offshore structures/production facilities, including: IEC, IOGP etc
	Effective communication within team and with stakeholders.
	Construction experience in Electrical installations for Oil and Gas facilities.
	Knowledge drawings mark-up and As-Built documentation.
	Knowledge drawings mark-up and As-Built documentation
	Skilled in use of ETAP for Power System Studies (Including but not limited to Short circuit/load flow, Fault level, Motor Starting etc).
	Knowledge of Bonga FPSO would be an added advantage.
	Skilled use of drawing tools for Electrical drawings.
	Skilled use of the MS Office suite.
	A good understanding of Industry, DEPs and Shell Design Standards.
	Proven ability to work in a multi-disciplinary team as well as to work independently with minimum supervision.
	Must have knowledge/skill level in HSSE and applications within the Oil and gas Industry.
	Good communication skills
	Team player
	Work in a multi-cultural environment.


Method of Application

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are looking for a versatile Digital Marketer with a strong foundation in digital strategy, graphics designing, content creation and campaign execution.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing the company’s online footprint, running marketing campaigns, growing brand awareness, and increasing conversions through paid and organic channels.

	Develop and implement strategic digital marketing plans across platforms (Google, Meta, LinkedIn, etc.).
	Create and publish engaging content (text, image, and video) for daily posts across all company social media profiles.
	Produce and edit marketing videos, reels, and promotional visuals.
	Design high-quality graphics and creatives for campaigns, promotions, and product launches.
	Manage and grow the company’s social media pages (Instagram, Facebook, X, LinkedIn, TikTok).
	Conduct audience research and monitor trends to create engaging and relevant content.
	Plan and execute email marketing campaigns with clear CTAs and strong conversion focus.
	Optimize website and content for SEO and user experience (UI/UX) is a add advantage..
	Monitor and manage Google Ads, Meta Ads, and other paid ad campaigns for ROI and lead generation.
	Track and analyze digital performance metrics using tools like Google Analytics, Meta Business Suite, and reporting dashboards.
	Collaborate with internal teams (product, sales, customer support) to ensure message consistency.
	Manage landing pages, pop-ups, and lead capture tools to drive user engagement.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Communications, Digital Media, or related fields.
	Minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience in digital marketing.
	Strong portfolio of video editing, content creation, and graphic design work.
	Proficiency in tools like Canva, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut, Photoshop, Figma, or similar.
	Proven ability to manage social media pages with measurable results.
	Strong knowledge of SEO best practices, keyword research, and on-page optimization.
	Experience running Google Ads, Meta Ads, and campaign budgeting.
	Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.
	Experience in the tech, travel, or ed-tech sectors is a strong plus.


Benefits


	Competitive salary (based on experience)
	Opportunity to work in a fast-growing, impact-driven organisation
	Creative freedom to shape brand presence across digital platforms
	Access to travel discounts and global exposure
